channel.title: Season 2 on Nyxipedia

item.title: S02E01
item.description: S02E01 # Lullaby Lounge: Season 2 Premiere Aired: 2020-??-?? Posted: 2020-08-09 This episode was the first of season 2, and the change-over to Tuesday nights. Kate had taken a break for about 2 months to let her voice recover from some serious strain. This episode was also the first with “The Part Where I Talk” including a proto-version of the jingle. I wanna tell you a story, about why I became the type of musician that I am today.
